featured.text: They take many photographs to record their observations.
His humane, spontaneous photographs helped establish photojournalism as an art form.
However, because it’s hard to get them to sit still and “perform on command,” some professional photographers refuse to photograph pets.
In what way is photographing zoo animals different from photographing pets?
When photographing zoo animals, don’t get too close to the cages, and never tap on the glass or throw things between the bars of a cage.

definition.zh_def: 用相機拍攝的靜態影像。
definition.en_def: A static image captured by a camera.
definition.example: She took a beautiful photograph of the sunset.
